code: var NEWNOTE='NEWNOTE';var SAVENOTE='SAVENOTE';var TOGGLEDISPLAY='TOGGLEDISPLAY';var DELETENOTE='DELETENOTE';var SEARCHENTRIES='SEARCHENTRIES';var APPLYFONTSTYLE='APPLYFONTSTYLE';var APPLYFONTCOLOR='APPLYFONTCOLOR';var APPLYPAGECOLOR='APPLYPAGECOLOR';var LOADDB="LOADDB";var LoadDb=function LoadDb(data){return{type:LOADDB,payload:data};};var NewNote=function NewNote(){return{type:NEWNOTE};};var SaveNote=function SaveNote(text,date,id){return{type:SAVENOTE,payload:{date:date,id:id,text:text}};};var ToggleDisplay=function ToggleDisplay(id){return{type:TOGGLEDISPLAY,payload:id};};var DeleteNote=function DeleteNote(id,date){return{type:DELETENOTE,id:id,date:date};};var SearchEntries=function SearchEntries(term){return{type:SEARCHENTRIES,payload:term};};var ApplyFontStyle=function ApplyFontStyle(style){return{type:APPLYFONTSTYLE,style:style};};var ApplyFontColor=function ApplyFontColor(color){return{type:APPLYFONTCOLOR,color:color};};var ApplyPageColor=function ApplyPageColor(color){return{type:APPLYPAGECOLOR,color:color};};export{NewNote,NEWNOTE,SAVENOTE,SaveNote,TOGGLEDISPLAY,ToggleDisplay,DELETENOTE,DeleteNote,SEARCHENTRIES,SearchEntries,ApplyFontStyle,APPLYFONTSTYLE,APPLYFONTCOLOR,ApplyFontColor,APPLYPAGECOLOR,ApplyPageColor,LOADDB,LoadDb};
